text: Sonja Atanasijević () (born in 1962) is a Serbian prose author and journalist, lives in Belgrade.Serbian Literary Society/Sonja Atanasijević == Published works == === Novels === * Oni su ostali, (They Remained) 1995. * Crveni krug, (Red Circle) 1997, 2007.Knjižara/ Published works Sonja Atanasijević * Bekstvo iz akvarijuma, (Escape from the Aquarium) 2003, 2005. * Narandže za Božanu, (Oranges for Bozana) 2004, 2005. * Ko je ubio Alfija, (Who Killed Alfi) 2009.Dereta/Ko je ubio Alfija * Vazdušni ljudi, (Air People) 2013, 2014.Delfi knjižare/ Vazdušni ljudi * Velika laž, (The Great Lie) 2016. * Spavaj, zveri moja (Sleep, My Beast) 2020. === Story collections === * Krilata tuga, (Winged Sadness) 2005. Her novels Escape from the Aquarium and Oranges for Bozana won the prize Zlatni hit liber from Radio Television of Serbia. The novel Air People won the prize Branko Copic from Serbian Academy of Sciences and Arts. == References == == External links == * Svet kultura/ Izabrano pet kandidata za NIN-ovu nagradu * SKC/Sonja Atanasijević: Vazdušni ljudi Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Belgrade Category:Serbian novelists Category:Serbian journalists Category:Serbian women poets Category:Serbian women writers Category:Women novelists
title: Sonja Atanasijević
